channel.title: Special Attack Help. *Delta
channel.description: How can I add special attack's to a weapon? The source is delta & no special's are coded into the server so far.

item.title: Special Attack Help. *Delta
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

First off to make the special do something in client.java
search for

Under that there are the codes that add damage/spec anim
for ex.

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7900 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(false, 50, 343, 1055);
//getHit(3);
dclawing = true;
usingSpecial = true;
dclaws = 4;

}[/code]

To make the spec bar go into special.java
There should be this void:

public void loginSpec(client c, int item) { switch(item) { case 7900: case 1215: case 1231: case 1249: case 1263: case 1305: case 1377: case 1434: case 3204: case 4587: case 5680: case 5698: case 5716: case 5730: case 6739: case 7158: case 859: case 861: case 4827: case 35: case 667: case 746: case 2402: case 8100: case 4151: case 4153:
The cases are the item ids.
You will also have to add your item in this void public void needSpecial(client c, int item, int target) {

Read full topic
